definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: stupid fellow, dullard, fool;—´[[כ]] Ps 49:11 + 44 t.; pl. [[כְּסִילִים]] Ps 94:8 + 25 t.;—‖[[בער]] Ps 49:11, Ps 92:7, Ps 94:8, elsewh. only in Wisd Lt.; he hates knowledge Pr 1:22; delights not in understanding Pr 18:2; it is his sport to do mischief Pr 10:23; his heart proclaimeth [[אִוֶּלָת]] Pr 12:23; his mouth poureth it forth Pr 15:2, and feedeth on it Pr 15:14.
